Key Arguments: The bill is unnecessary and not the answer to misinformation and disinformation.
The scope of the bill could extend to suppressing political debate and dissenting opinions.
There is concern over the exemption for government communications from being considered misinformation or disinformation.
Emphasizes the importance of freedom of expression as enshrined in Article 19 of the Universal Declaration of Human Rights.
Notable Quotes: Why should politicians be above the law?
The only way we can put an end to it is to have open, public debate.
